import React, {useState, useEffect} from 'react' import WeightIcon from './images/weights.png' function SidePanel(){ const [squads, updateSquads] = useState([]) useEffect(() => { fetch('/api/squads') .then(res => res.json()) .then(data => updateSquads(data)) .then(console.log(squads)) }, []) const squad_names = squads.map((squad,i) =>

{squad}

) return(

Trainings

Novice Girls

U16 Boys

U16/17 Girls

Senior Boys

Regattas

Events

) } export default SidePanel
